scripts.generate-project: rimraf dist/*_ && ([ -d 'dist' ] || mkdir dist) && ([ -d 'dist/images' ] || mkdir dist/images) && ([ -d 'src/content/projects' ] || mkdir src/content/projects) && ([ -d 'public/projects' ] || mkdir public/projects) && rimraf src/content/projects/_ && bunx tsx src/libs/notion/converter.ts -d src/libs/notion/databases/project.database.ts -o projects
scripts.generate-blog: rimraf dist/*_ && ([ -d 'dist' ] || mkdir dist) && ([ -d 'dist/images' ] || mkdir dist/images) && ([ -d 'src/content/blog' ] || mkdir src/content/blog) && ([ -d 'public/blog' ] || mkdir public/blog) && rimraf src/content/blog/_ && bunx tsx src/libs/notion/converter.ts -d src/libs/notion/databases/blog.database.ts -o blog
